metadata.title: CVE-2020-36330 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - medium.
metadata.description: A flaw was found in libwebp in versions before 1.0.1. An out-of-bounds read was found in function ChunkVerifyAndAssign. The highest threat from this vulnerability is to data confidentiality and to the service availability.

criterions.comment: libwebp package in hirsute was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '0.6.1-2ubuntu0.21.04.1').
